data.title: generasia
data.text:
JOSHUA was a Japanese/American model. He's the little brother of fellow fashion model Kozue Rin.

Profile

Stage Name: JOSHUA (ジョシュア)

Real Name: Niimura Joshua (新村 Joshua)

Birthdate: December 31, 1982

Deathdate: May 20, 2008 (aged 25)

Birthplace: Virginia, USA

Blood Type: O

Height: 172cm

Hobbies: Watching movies, skateboarding, drawing, sports

Chest: 83cm

Waist: 70cm

Hips: 80cm

Shoe Size: 26cm

Information

JOSHUA first started working as a model in 1999, and has appeared in such magazines as Men's Nonno, SMART.

JOSHUA appeared as a VJ for the Space Shower TV show "STAND!" in April of 2005. He has also featured in several music videos, notably one for Tina and as a groom in Crystal Kay's Kiss.

In mid 2004, JOSHUA married a model who worked in the same company as him (Office Ama), Tsuchiya Anna. On November 19th 2004 Anna gave birth to a baby boy, named Sky (澄海, sukai). However, in early July 2006, the couple have decided to break it off and have filed for divorce.[1]

On May 20, 2008, JOSHUA died of heart failure. According to his spokespeople, a private funeral was conducted, and his ex-wife was devastated at the news.[2]
